author: diehardlegofan
title: No, I am Not Over-Exaggerating
review: Yes, I did rate this set 5 stars for everything.  No, this is not the best set ever, I just can't think of anything wrong with it.  What do I love so much about this set?  I always remembered loving those yellow cars.  There was something that was just so humble and awesome about the color yellow.  Humbleness, to me, is one of the keys to making something awesome.  Everything is so much fun about this set; you have fun when you build it, you have fun when you play with it, and you have fun taking it apart and building something else!  And I do believe this set has a combination model.  I never built that, I only bought this car and the red one.  This set is so much fun to play with and race with other cars.  The pieces are great.  Yes, some of them do have stickers, but if I remember correctly; it was only the pullback motor, the headlight pieces, and the flame pieces that have stickers.  Yes, a surprising amount of printed pieces in this set.  My favorite pieces in this set are definitely the black wedge pieces on the top of the car.  You can add those to any vehicle you make and it looks good.  You can add them to a boat, a car, a robot, or even a motorcycle; and they look good!  If you do not have this set already, and you have the means of getting it; I HIGHLY recommend that you buy it.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Racers (Drome Racers) - Hot Buster Review
review:
There's nothing much to say about this set. It looks really cool and it has some nice valuable pieces which are printed. In fact: We get no stickers in this set. We also don't get any minifigs with this car. But I love the play feature where you move the car back with the pull-back-engine which allows you to launch the car better. It drives very fast and it looks very fast as well. I'm really glad to have it - even if it doesn't have many play features. It's a great set for little money and a great starter set for the young kids for sure. It's also a great seet if you want to get some nice pieces for future MOC's (My own creations) or brickfilms.

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
